metric_explanation.raw_dimension_x: Number of x voxels in raw images
metric_explanation.raw_dimension_y: Number of y voxels in raw images
metric_explanation.raw_dimension_z: Number of z voxels in raw images
metric_explanation.raw_voxel_size_x: Voxel size in x direction in raw images
metric_explanation.raw_voxel_size_y: Voxel size in y direction in raw images
metric_explanation.raw_voxel_size_z: Voxel size in z direction in raw images
metric_explanation.raw_max_b: Maximum b-value in s/mm^2 in raw images
metric_explanation.raw_neighbor_corr: Neighboring DWI Correlation (NDC) of raw images
metric_explanation.raw_num_bad_slices: Number of bad slices in raw images (from DSI Studio)
metric_explanation.raw_num_directions: Number of directions sampled in raw images
metric_explanation.t1_dimension_x: Number of x voxels in preprocessed images
metric_explanation.t1_dimension_y: Number of y voxels in preprocessed images
metric_explanation.t1_dimension_z: Number of z voxels in preprocessed images
metric_explanation.t1_voxel_size_x: Voxel size in x direction in preprocessed images
metric_explanation.t1_voxel_size_y: Voxel size in y direction in preprocessed images
metric_explanation.t1_voxel_size_z: Voxel size in z direction in preprocessed images
metric_explanation.t1_max_b: Maximum b-value s/mm^2 in preprocessed images
metric_explanation.t1_neighbor_corr: Neighboring DWI Correlation (NDC) of preprocessed images
metric_explanation.t1_num_bad_slices: Number of bad slices in preprocessed images (from DSI Studio)
metric_explanation.t1_num_directions: Number of directions sampled in preprocessed images
metric_explanation.mean_fd: Mean framewise displacement from head motion
metric_explanation.max_fd: Maximum framewise displacement from head motion
metric_explanation.max_rel_rotation: Maximum rotation relative to the previous head position
metric_explanation.max_rel_translation: Maximum translation relative to the previous head position
metric_explanation.t1_dice_distance: Dice score for the overlap of the T1w-based brain mask and the b=0 ref mask
